    Layout

    
 struct VkSamplerYcbcrConversionCreateInfoKHR {
     VkStructureType sType;
     void const * pNext;
     VkFormat format;
     VkSamplerYcbcrModelConversion ycbcrModel;
     VkSamplerYcbcrRange ycbcrRange;
     VkComponentMapping components;
     VkChromaLocation xChromaOffset;
     VkChromaLocation yChromaOffset;
     VkFilter chromaFilter;
     VkBool32 forceExplicitReconstruction;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • VkSamplerYcbcrConversionCreateInfoKHR

        public VkSamplerYcbcrConversionCreateInfoKHR​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a VkSamplerYcbcrConversionCreateInfoKHR instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
